outline.title: Title Slide
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the strategy, presenter Tuqa Al-Kaabi, and date.

outline.title: Executive Summary
outline.summary: Overview of the market opportunity, gap in Iraq, WB's advantage, and the $1.5M financial goal.

outline.title: Vision & Mission
outline.summary: Defining the vision to be the trusted destination and the mission to build an integrated nutrition division.

outline.title: Market Opportunity
outline.summary: Data on the $4.10B MEA market size and growth, highlighting the shift to natural products in Iraq.

outline.title: Market Trends
outline.summary: Key trends in Iraq: health awareness, natural products, online sales, personalization, and specific health interests.

outline.title: Target Audience
outline.summary: Four key segments: Beauty/Health Women, Athletes, Health Seekers, and Families/Moms.

outline.title: Unique Value Proposition
outline.summary: The unique combination of Trust, Personalization, Quality, and Integration offered by WB Nutrition.

outline.title: Strategic Goals
outline.summary: Key objectives: $1.5M sales, market leadership, private label products, and community building.

outline.title: Three-Phase Product Strategy
outline.summary: Overview of the 3 phases: MVP (1-6 months), Expansion (7-18 months), and Leadership (19-36 months).

outline.title: Phase 1: MVP Launch
outline.summary: Details of Phase 1: 15-20 products across key categories and basic consultation services.

outline.title: Phase 2 & 3: Expansion & Leadership
outline.summary: Details of Phase 2 (Expansion) and Phase 3 (Leadership) including private label and advanced services.

outline.title: Product Categories & Margins
outline.summary: Breakdown of product categories, target segments, and expected profit margins (30-55%).

outline.title: Go-to-Market Strategy
outline.summary: Three-phase GTM: Pre-launch teaser, Launch week with influencers, and Post-launch growth.

outline.title: Marketing Channels
outline.summary: Key channels: Influencers, Social Media, Paid Ads, Content Marketing, Email, and SEO.

outline.title: Organizational Structure
outline.summary: Team structure led by Tuqa Al-Kaabi and integration with existing WB teams.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/Screenshot2026-02-02at10.18.12PM.png - The image describes the organizational structure and responsibilities, which aligns with the slide's content about organizational structure.

outline.title: Financial Projections
outline.summary: Revenue forecast reaching $1.5M+ by 2028 with target gross and net margins.

outline.title: Risk Analysis
outline.summary: Key risks (Competition, Regulation, Supply Chain) and mitigation strategies.

outline.title: Implementation Timeline
outline.summary: Week-by-week timeline for the first 6 months from hiring to official launch.

outline.title: Key Success Factors
outline.summary: Critical factors: Credibility, Personalization, Quality, Content, Integration, and Agility.

outline.title: Next Steps
outline.summary: Immediate actions required and commitment to success.

outline.title: Thank You
outline.summary: Closing slide with contact information and a final inspiring statement.
